edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme

Interface CmtCommitValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CmtBigIntegerCommitValue, CmtByteArrayCommitValue, CmtGroupElementCommitValue

    public interface CmtCommitValue
    General interface for commit value. Each commit value type (like BigInteger, Byte[], etc) should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Plaintext convertToPlaintext()
      Converts the committed value into a plaintext in order to encrypt it.
      java.io.Serializable generateSendableData()
      Returns a serializable object from this commit value.
      java.lang.Object getX()
      The committed values can vary, therefore returns an Object instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        java.lang.Object getX()
        The committed values can vary, therefore returns an Object instance.
        Returns:
        the committed value.

      • convertToPlaintext

        Plaintext convertToPlaintext()
        Converts the committed value into a plaintext in order to encrypt it.
        Returns:
        the plaintext contains this commit value.

      • generateSendableData

        java.io.Serializable generateSendableData()
        Returns a serializable object from this commit value.
        Returns:
        a serializable object from this commit value.
